images.copyright: Aerial view of the glaciers and mountains of Kluane National Park and Reserve, near Haines Junction, Yukon, Canada (© Robert Postma/plainpicture)
images.title: Mountain wilderness and glacial scenery
images.caption: Mountain wilderness and glacial scenery
images.desc: Located in the south western corner of Yukon Territory, Kluane National Park and Reserve boasts 17 of Canada’s 20 highest peaks. It is home to Mount Logan, the tallest peak in the country, which measures 5,959 metres. Encompassing an area of 22,000 square kilometres, Kluane National Park and Reserve sits as the largest protected area in the world. In 1972, it became a national park and reserve, and in 1979 it was designated a UNESCO World Heritage site.

tooltips.walls: इस छवि को डाउनलोड करें. इस छवि का उपयोग केवल वॉलपेपर तक प्रतिबंधित है.
